name: change-name
objective: We want to make sure we can change the stock in the Stock widget by looking for the name
description: UI allow to change the Stock. The stock information is downloaded and displayed

steps.description: Fill input text field with an existing stock name (e.g. Intel) and valid

author: sdx

name: change-ticker
objective: We want to make sure we can change the stock in the Stock widget by looking for the ticker symbol
description: UI allow to change the Stock. The stock information is downloaded and displayed

steps.description: Fill input text field with an existing ticker symbol (e.g. INTC) and valid

author: sdx

name: search-nonexisting-stock
objective: We want to make sure there is no instability when searching a non-existing stock in the Stock widget
description: UI allow to change the Stock. The stock information is downloaded and displayed
pre_condition: The Stock widget is configured to display Intel information

steps.description: Fill input text field with a non-existing stock name (e.g. azdbnop) and valid

steps.expected: Information of previous stock is displayed (Intel)

author: sdx

name: search-nonexisting-ticker
objective: We want to make sure there is no instability when searching a non-existing ticker symbol in the Stock widget
description: UI allow to change the Stock. The stock information is downloaded and displayed
pre_condition: The Stock widget is configured to display INTC information

steps.description: Fill input text field with a non-existing ticker symbol (e.g. AFCOPART) and valid

steps.expected: Information of previous stock is displayed (Intel)

author: sdx

name: changes-as-pct
objective: We want to make sure the checkbox 'show change as a percentage' works properly
description: Settings allow to configure change as percentage
pre_condition: the Stock widget is configured to display INTC information

steps.description: Check 'show change as a percentage' and valid with [Done]
steps.expected: Setting is saved. Change is displayed as a percentage (e.g. -1.09%)

steps.description: Go back to settings and uncheck 'show change as a percentage' and valid with [Done]
steps.expected: Setting is saved. Change is displayed as a price (e.g. -9.09)

author: sdx

name: show-information
objective: We want to make sure information displayed by the Stock widget are well displayed and correct
description: stocks widget allows you to see the most important information about your stock
pre_condition: The Stock widget is configured to display Google information

steps.description: Check Widget displays Stock name and sticker code, stock chart, change percentage/price, price at previous close (Open), Day low (Low), Day high (High), Average Volume, Market cap
Check information from another source than Yahoo Finance (e.g. http://www.marketwatch.com/investing/stock/goog)

author: sdx
